message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Would you be able to accommodate this price?
I understand your budget concerns, Bob. While I value this product highly, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $15,000?

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, based on my financial situation, I can only commit to a maximum of $12,000 for the product. Could we possibly meet at this price point?
